com.camerontec.util.crypto

Class PublicKeyCryptoHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.crypto.PublicKeyCryptoHelper

  • public final class PublicKeyCryptoHelper
extends Object
    Common methods for RSA public key cryptography, including signing and verifying signatures.

    • Method Detail

      • sign

        public static byte[] sign(byte[] srcData,
                          byte[] privKeyBytes,
                          String signatureAlgo)
                   throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                          InvalidKeyException,
                          InvalidKeySpecException,
                          SignatureException
        Create a digital signature.
        Parameters:
        srcData - data to sign
        privKeyBytes - private key
        signatureAlgo - one of the supported signature algorithms
        Returns:
        byte array containing the signature
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if unsupported sig algorithm is specified
        InvalidKeyException - if private key is invalid
        InvalidKeySpecException - if private key format is incorrect
        SignatureException - if signature is incorrectly initialized

      • sign

        public static byte[] sign(byte[] srcData,
                          InputStream privKeyStream)
                   throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                          InvalidKeyException,
                          InvalidKeySpecException,
                          SignatureException,
                          IOException
        Create a digital signature. The default signature algorithm is used (SHA512withRSA)
        Parameters:
        srcData - data to sign
        privKeyStream - stream to private key
        Returns:
        byte array containing the signature
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if unsupported sig algorithm is specified
        InvalidKeyException - if private key is invalid
        InvalidKeySpecException - if private key format is incorrect
        SignatureException - if signature is incorrectly initialized
        IOException - if private key file cannot be read

      • verify

        public static boolean verify(byte[] srcData,
                             byte[] signature,
                             byte[] pubKeyBytes,
                             String signatureAlgo)
                      throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                             InvalidKeyException,
                             InvalidKeySpecException,
                             SignatureException
        Verify a digital signature.
        Parameters:
        srcData - data to verify
        signature - signature to verify
        pubKeyBytes - public key
        signatureAlgo - one of the supported signature algorithms
        Returns:
        true if signature is valid for the given data
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if unsupported sig algorithm is specified
        InvalidKeyException - if public key is invalid
        InvalidKeySpecException - if public key format is incorrect
        SignatureException - if signature is unusable

      • verify

        public static boolean verify(byte[] srcData,
                             byte[] signature,
                             InputStream pubKeyStream)
                      throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                             InvalidKeyException,
                             InvalidKeySpecException,
                             SignatureException,
                             IOException
        Verify a digital signature using the default signature algorithm (SHA512withRSA).
        Parameters:
        srcData - data to verify
        signature - signature to verify
        pubKeyStream - stream to public key
        Returns:
        true if signature is valid for the given data
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if unsupported sig algorithm is specified
        InvalidKeyException - if public key is invalid
        InvalidKeySpecException - if public key format is incorrect
        SignatureException - if signature is unusable
        IOException - if public key file cannot be read

      • verify

        public static boolean verify(byte[] srcData,
                             String signatureBase64,
                             InputStream pubKeyStream)
                      throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                             InvalidKeyException,
                             InvalidKeySpecException,
                             SignatureException,
                             IOException
        Verify a digital signature in base64 format using the default signature algorithm (SHA512withRSA).
        Parameters:
        srcData - data to verify
        signatureBase64 - signature to verify, in base64 encoding
        pubKeyStream - stream to public key
        Returns:
        true if signature is valid for given data
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if unsupported sig algorithm is specified
        InvalidKeyException - if public key is invalid
        InvalidKeySpecException - if public key format is incorrect
        SignatureException - if signature is unusable
        IOException - if public key file cannot be read

      • verify

                             String signatureBase64,
                             byte[] pubKeyBytes)
                      throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                             InvalidKeyException,
                             InvalidKeySpecException,
                             SignatureException
        Verify a digital signature in base64 format using the default signature algorithm (SHA512withRSA).
        Parameters:
        srcData - data to verify
        signatureBase64 - signature to verify, in base64 encoding
        pubKeyBytes - public key bytes
        Returns:
        true if signature is valid for given data
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if unsupported sig algorithm is specified
        InvalidKeyException - if public key is invalid
        InvalidKeySpecException - if public key format is incorrect
        SignatureException - if signature is unusable
